name: Pre-Construction
Section of works
Pit / Line Information:
Date Works Commenced:
All materials delivered to site have been inspected thoroughly and:
a) Are free of damage/cracks
b) Pipe class, type and size matches plans.
(upload images of any damaged materials here)
HOLD POINT - Clients representative to acknowledge materials have been inspected and are free of damage/cracks.
Construction
Pits/Trenches set out clearly & accurately
Trenches excavated to depth and checked with grade laser (allowed for 100mm bedding)
Trench bedding material installed as per specification
Pipe laid to grade (as per drawings) ensuring socket faces upstream and is free of foreign materials prior to installation of adjoining pipe
Each joint visually inspected (rubber rings, witness marks, etc) and lifting holes plugged
Haunching installed and is compliant
HOLD POINT - Clients representative to acknowledge compliant Pipe/Pit/Haunching Installation
Backfill
Suitable material backfilled in compacted layers
